documents.document: Check out #actuallivingscientist. It's awesome. Same with #DressLikeAWoman

@ohsheglows recipes are the best. Dairy and egg-free, GF and delicious banana bread. Made w toddler https://t.co/0ZXYPRksDa
I'm tempted to post third trimester bingo on my cubicle. #pregnancy via @pregnantchicken https://t.co/FVug2FHg5F
I am proud of CDN response to Muslims being murdered by white supremacist via @nytimes https://t.co/rUvFA5Do3N
I'm finding listening to @JustinTrudeau just as repugnant as #Harper b/c I've lost hope he means what he says, which sucks #cdnpoli
Outrageous that @JustinTrudeau abandoning electoral reform - key campaign promise. Agree w @leadnowca https://t.co/OZgeHCVTq6 #cdnpoli

@RegimeChangeBC I reject your effort to set up increased govt support for childcare vs helping poor

@BarleysHomebrew cool thanks!
@trishhennessy @ArmineYalnizyan oh I'm sad to hear leaving the @ccpa - such an important voice! Look forward to hearing what's next
@minimalistbaker excited to try these!

@BarleysHomebrew any chance you'll carry vegan version of this? https://t.co/cDGiuBmfaF
@proletariatkami thanks for info

This is why we need @10Aday childcare plan in BC. Families can't afford housing + mortgage https://t.co/rPj8ldLYWc @GenSqueeze #bcpoli
@polohealth can you share tips for non-dairy fermented foods? I don't think we have enough in diet
thx @PJNewWest I need to do my homework to figure out what my thoughts are first!
@10aDayPlan awesome, thanks!
@PJNewWest is it too late to give feedback on brunette interchange? Where is right place ? #newwest
@DonovanCavers I didn't do the work myself, I'll let @10aDayPlan answer. As a data point, Quebec had $5/day and switched to $7/day
@10aDayPlan do you have any shareable memes on childcare? do you need some made?
@DonovanCavers @10aDayPlan i'm pretty sure the answer to that question will depend you ask. What is definition of better? better for who?
I really hope conservatives elect @MichaelChongMP. Principled conservative leader a welcome change #cdnpoli https://t.co/ZNlFSJloiA
Thanks @10aDayPlan - who gets funding from Feds? @jyduclos
@DonovanCavers so? Don't we want political parties to respond to citizen pressure for policy? $10aDay outcome of very long process w experts
@BCGreens @AJWVictoriaBC I think the topic of childcare deserves a more fulsome treatment. I look forward to more. #bcpoli
@10aDayPlan do you know if fed govt has done anything on their childcare campaign promise? #cdnpoli
Hi @10aDayPlan are there any hashtags we should use to talk about childcare in BC?
@BCGreens @AJWVictoriaBC sure I'll read it. I'm lkooking for a commitment to $10aDay plan
@DarcyJudy @bcndp yes, reasonably, they are waiting for Budget to come out to announce that.
@BCGreens Ok - makes it tough for people to figure out who to volunteer for!
@BCGreens i'm starting a childcare advocacy group. I'm looking for your exact position on childcare. Can you share? #bcpoli
@bcliberals i'm starting a childcare advocacy group. I'm looking for your exact position on childcare. Can you share? #bcpoli
@minimalistbaker This looks SO good!
Themes of #childcare talk w @DarcyJudy: affordability, quality, no 0-3 spaces, no spaces in Queensborough, paying staff living wage, transit
Thanks to @DarcyJudy and @Oldcrowcoffee for hosting #childcare round table. Great turnout #newest
@MOVENewWest cool! How much would it be? I have a 3 yr old who wants to join friend
hi @MOVENewWest - saturday kids yoga class is not drop-in right?
@MikeUsinger great news re #RailwayClub @RailwayClub
@minimalistbaker ok - more question - should I use one type of suggested alternative for brown rice flour and another for white rice flour?
@MikeFolka @PJNewWest The 5th Street folks appear immune to facts.
Tell Trudeau: Welcome Those Fleeing Violence and Deportation Under Trump https://t.co/LL3onLV7DN #womensmarch action @leadnowca #cdnpoli

@YesInNewWest in my calendar. A bit tricky w kid and dinner time but will do my best!
@minimalistbaker ok cool
@YesInNewWest @TheRecord this article was so frustrating to read. I need to breathe before trying to respond reasonably
@minimalistbaker great- can I just sub one of those for rice flour in your GF flour recipe?

hey @pregnantchicken have any good memes on supporting new moms I can share for #bellletstalk ?

@ianabailey I actually agree w @jjhorgan on this. Not reasonable expectation of #ndp
@NadineNakagawa anything in mind for #newwest? I'm open but I'll have my toddler and she'd freak out at a protest
